text: asādhāraṇayē bhūmiyehi uṅagukamin hæsirennan magē niyōgayan pratikṣēpa karana lesaṭa pat karannemi. ebævin ovun sādhakayan siyalla (tama dǣsin) duṭuvada, ēvā viśvāsama nokarannāha. esēma ṛju mārgaya ovun duṭuvada, ovun eya (taman) yā yutu mārgaya vaśayen bāra nogannāha. ehet væradi mārgaya duṭuvahot nam, eyama (taman) yā yutu mārgaya vaśayen bāra gannāha. niyata vaśayenma ovun apagē āyāvan boru kara, ēvā pratikṣēpa kara, nosælakilimatva siṭīmama meyaṭa hētuva vē
